047        public static final Pattern SENTENCE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(".+?[\\.?!]+\\s+");              
048                
049        public static final BiFunction<String, Object, InputStream> OBJECT_TO_INPUT_STREAM_ENCODER = (path, contents) -> {
050                InputStream ret = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.convert(contents, InputStream.class);
051                if (ret == null) {
052                        // toString() conversion
053                        ret = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.convert(String.valueOf(contents), InputStream.class);
054                }
055                return ret;
056        };              
057        
058        public static final BiFunction<String, InputStream, String> INPUT_STREAM_TO_STRING_DECODER = (path, state) -> DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.convert(state, String.class);

060        public static final String CLASSPATH_SCHEME = "classpath";

062        public static final String CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX = CLASSPATH_SCHEME + "://";

067        
068        /**
069         * Converts name to label text by breaking the name by camel case, capitalizing the first word and lowsercasing the rest.
070         * @return
071         */
072        public static String nameToLabel(String name) {
073                String[] cca = StringUtils.splitByCharacterTypeCamelCase(name);
074                cca[0] = StringUtils.capitalize(cca[0]);
075                for (int i=1; i<cca.length; ++i) {
076                        cca[i] = cca[i].toLowerCase();
077                }
078                return String.join(" ", cca);
079        }
080                
081        /**
082         * Converts string in camel case, e.g. <code>firstName</code> to kebab case, e.g. <code>first-name</code>
083         * @return
084         */
085        public static String camelToKebab(String str) {
086                String[] ns = StringUtils.splitByCharacterTypeCamelCase(str);
087                for (int i = 0; i < ns.length; ++i) {
088                        ns[i] = ns[i].toLowerCase();
089                }
090                return String.join("-", ns);
091        }
092        
093        public static boolean isBlank(String str) {
094                return str == null || str.trim().length() == 0;
095        }
096        
097        /**
098         * Creates a function for context mapping which recognizes path navigation with ..
099         * @param prefix
100         * @return
101         */
102        public static java.util.function.Function<String,String> hierarchicalMapper(String prefix) {            
103                return key -> {
104                        StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(prefix + key, "/", true);
105                        LinkedList<String> collector = new LinkedList<>();
106                        while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
107                                String token = st.nextToken();
108                                if ("..".equals(token) && collector.size() > 1 && !"..".equals(collector.get(collector.size() - 2))) {
109                                        collector.removeLast();
110                                        collector.removeLast();
111                                        if (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
112                                                st.nextToken(); 
113                                        }
114                                } else {
115                                        collector.add(token);
116                                }
117                        }
118                        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
119                        collector.forEach(sb::append);
120                        return sb.toString();                   
121                };
122        }
123        
124        public static InputStream join(Stream<InputStream> streams) throws IOException {
125                ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
126                streams.forEach(in -> {
127                        if (in != null) {                               
128                                try (BufferedInputStream bin = new BufferedInputStream(in)) {
129                                        int b;
130                                        while ((b = bin.read()) != -1) {
131                                                baos.write(b);
132                                        }                                               
133                                } catch (IOException e) {
134                                        throw new NasdanikaException("Error joining streams: " + e, e);
135                                }
136                        }
137                });
138                baos.close();
139                return new ByteArrayInputStream(baos.toByteArray());
140        }
141        
142        public static InputStream join(InputStream... streams) throws IOException {
143                if (streams.length == 1) {
144                        return streams[0];
145                }
146                ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
147                for (InputStream in: streams) {
148                        if (in != null) {
149                                try (BufferedInputStream bin = new BufferedInputStream(in)) {
150                                        int b;
151                                        while ((b = bin.read()) != -1) {
152                                                baos.write(b);
153                                        }                                               
154                                }
155                        }
156                }
157                baos.close();
158                return new ByteArrayInputStream(baos.toByteArray());
159        }
160        
161        public static InputStream toStream(Context context, String text) throws IOException {
162                Charset charset = context.get(Charset.class, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
163                ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
164                if (text != null) {
165                        try (OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(baos, charset)) {
166                                writer.write(text);
167                        }
168                }
169                baos.close();
170                return new ByteArrayInputStream(baos.toByteArray());
171        }

173        public static FunctionFactory<String,InputStream> TO_STREAM = context -> new Function<String, InputStream>() {
174                
175                @Override
176                public double size() {
177                        return 1;
178                }
179                
180                @Override
181                public String name() {
182                        return "String to InputStream";
183                }
184                
185                @Override
186                public InputStream execute(String text, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
187                        try {
188                                return toStream(context, text);
189                        } catch (IOException e) {
190                                throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
191                        }
192                }
193                
194        };

196        public static FunctionFactory<Object,InputStream> OBJECT_TO_STREAM = context -> new Function<Object, InputStream>() {
197                
198                @Override
199                public double size() {
200                        return 1;
201                }
202                
203                @Override
204                public String name() {
205                        return "Object to InputStream";
206                }
207                
208                @Override
209                public InputStream execute(Object object, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
210                        if (object == null) {
211                                return null;
212                        }
213                        if (object instanceof InputStream) {
214                                return (InputStream) object;
215                        }
216                        
217                        return asInputStreamSupplierFactory(object).create(context).execute(progressMonitor);
218                }
219                
220        };
221        
222        
223        public static String toString(Context context, InputStream in) throws IOException {
224                if (in == null) {
225                        return "";
226                }
227                StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
228                Charset charset = context.get(Charset.class, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
229                try (Reader reader = new InputStreamReader(new BufferedInputStream(in), charset)) {
230                        int ch;
231                        while ((ch = reader.read()) != -1) {
232                                sw.write(ch);
233                        }
234                }
235                sw.close();
236                return sw.toString();
237        }

258                }

300        public static FunctionFactory<Object,Object> INTERPOLATE = context -> new Function<Object,Object>() {
301                
302                @Override
303                public double size() {
304                        return 1;
305                }
306                
307                @Override
308                public String name() {
309                        return "Interpolation";
310                }
311                
312                @Override
313                public Object execute(Object input, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
314                        if (input instanceof String) {
315                                return context.interpolate((String) input);
316                        }
317                        if (input instanceof Map) {
318                                return context.interpolate((Map<?,?>) input);
319                        }
320                        if (input instanceof Collection) {
321                                return context.interpolate((Collection<?>) input);
322                        }
323                        
324                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot interpolate " + input);
325                }
326                
327        };

386        public static InputStream filter(Context context, InputStream in, java.util.function.Function<String,String> filter) throws IOException {
387                return toStream(context, filter.apply(toString(context, in)));
388        }       
389                
390        public static Function<List<InputStream>, InputStream> JOIN_STREAMS = new Function<List<InputStream>, InputStream>() {
391
392                @Override
393                public double size() {
394                        return 1;
395                }
396
397                @Override
398                public String name() {
399                        return "Joining content";
400                }
401
402                @Override
403                public InputStream execute(List<InputStream> content, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
404                        try {
405                                return join(content.toArray(new InputStream[content.size()]));
406                        } catch (IOException e) {
407                                throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
408                        }
409                }
410                
411        };
412        
413        public static FunctionFactory<List<InputStream>, InputStream> JOIN_STREAMS_FACTORY = new FunctionFactory<List<InputStream>, InputStream>() {
414
415                @Override
416                public Function<List<InputStream>, InputStream> create(Context context) {
417                        return JOIN_STREAMS;
418                }
419                
420        };

422        /**
423         * Converts {@link Object} to {@link String} using {@link Util}.toString() if object is {@link InputStream} and using context converter, if it s present, otherwise.
424         */
425        public static FunctionFactory<Object, String> OBJECT_TO_STRING_FACTORY = context -> new Function<Object,String>() {
426
427                @Override
428                public double size() {
429                        return 1;
430                }
431
432                @Override
433                public String name() {
434                        return "Object to String";
435                }
436
437                @Override
438                public String execute(Object obj, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
439                        if (obj == null) {
440                                return null;
441                        }
442                        if (obj instanceof InputStream) {
443                                try {
444                                        return Util.toString(context, (InputStream) obj);
445                                } catch (IOException e) {
446                                        throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
447                                }
448                        }
449                Converter converter = context.get(Converter.class);
450                if (converter != null) {
451                        String str = converter.convert(obj, String.class);
452                        if (str != null) {
453                                return str;
454                        }
455                }
456                        return obj.toString();
457                }
458        };
459                
460        /**
461         * Extracts first sentence from text
462         * @param context
463         * @param text
464         * @return
465         */
466        public static String firstSentence(String text, int minSentenceLength, int maxSentenceLength, String... abbreviations) {
467                if (text == null || text.length() < minSentenceLength) {
468                        return text;
469                }
470                Matcher matcher = SENTENCE_PATTERN.matcher(text);               
471                Z: while (matcher.find()) {
472                        String group = matcher.group();
473                        for (String abbr: abbreviations) {
474                                if (group.trim().endsWith(abbr)) {
475                                        continue Z;
476                                }
477                        }
478                        if (matcher.end() > minSentenceLength && matcher.end() < maxSentenceLength) {
479                                return text.substring(0, matcher.end());
480                        }
481                }
482                
483                return text.length() < maxSentenceLength ? text : text.substring(0, maxSentenceLength)+"...";
484        }
485        
486        /**
487         * Extracts first sentence from text
488         * @param context
489         * @param text
490         * @return
491         */
492        public static String firstPlainTextSentence(String html, int minSentenceLength, int maxSentenceLength, String... abbreviations) {
493                if (html == null || html.length() < minSentenceLength) {
494                        return Jsoup.parse(html).text();
495                }
496                return firstSentence(Jsoup.parse(html).text(), minSentenceLength, maxSentenceLength, abbreviations);
497        }       
498
499        /**
500         * Executes full supplier lifecycle - diagnose, execute, commit/rollback, close.
501         * @param monitor
502         * @param diagnosticConsumer TODO
503         * @param context
504         * @param component
505         * @return
506         */
507        public static <T> T call(Supplier<T> supplier, ProgressMonitor monitor, Consumer<Diagnostic> diagnosticConsumer, Status... failOnStatuses) {
508                try (ProgressMonitor progressMonitor = monitor.setWorkRemaining(3).split("Calling supplier", 3)) {
509                        Diagnostic diagnostic = supplier.splitAndDiagnose(progressMonitor);
510                        if (diagnosticConsumer != null) {
511                                diagnosticConsumer.accept(diagnostic);
512                        }
513                        Status status = diagnostic.getStatus();
514                        if (failOnStatuses.length == 0) {
515                                if (status == Status.FAIL) {
516                                        throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
517                                }
518                        } else {
519                                for (Status failStatus: failOnStatuses) {
520                                        if (status == failStatus) {
521                                                throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
522                                        }                                       
523                                }
524                        }
525                        
526                        try {
527                                T result = supplier.splitAndExecute(progressMonitor);
528                                supplier.splitAndCommit(progressMonitor);
529                                return result;
530                        } catch (Exception e) {
531                                supplier.splitAndRollback(progressMonitor);
532                                throw e;
533                        }
534                } finally {
535                        supplier.close();
536                }
537        }
538        
539        /**
540         * Executes full Command lifecycle - diagnose, execute, commit/rollback, close.
541         * @param context
542         * @param monitor
543         * @param component
544         * @param failOnStatuses Status on which to throw {@link DiagnosticException}. Defaults to FAIL.
545         * @return
546         */
547        public static Diagnostic call(Command command, ProgressMonitor monitor, Status... failOnStatuses) {
548                try (ProgressMonitor progressMonitor = monitor.setWorkRemaining(3).split("Calling command", 3)) {
549                        Diagnostic diagnostic = command.splitAndDiagnose(progressMonitor);                      
550                        Status status = diagnostic.getStatus();
551                        if (failOnStatuses.length == 0) {
552                                if (status == Status.FAIL) {
553                                        throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
554                                }
555                        } else {
556                                for (Status failStatus: failOnStatuses) {
557                                        if (status == failStatus) {
558                                                throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
559                                        }                                       
560                                }
561                        }
562                        
563                        try {
564                                command.splitAndExecute(progressMonitor);
565                                command.splitAndCommit(progressMonitor);
566                        } catch (Exception e) {
567                                command.splitAndRollback(progressMonitor);
568                                throw e;
569                        }
570                        return diagnostic;
571                } finally {
572                        command.close();
573                }
574        }
575        
576        /**
577         * Executes full Consumer lifecycle - diagnose, execute, commit/rollback, close.
578         * @param context
579         * @param monitor
580         * @param component
581         * @param failOnStatuses Status on which to throw {@link DiagnosticException}. Defaults to FAIL.
582         * @return
583         */
584        public static <T> Diagnostic call(org.nasdanika.common.Consumer<T> consumer, T arg,  ProgressMonitor monitor, Status... failOnStatuses) {
585                try (ProgressMonitor progressMonitor = monitor.setWorkRemaining(3).split("Calling consumer", 3)) {
586                        Diagnostic diagnostic = consumer.splitAndDiagnose(progressMonitor);                     
587                        Status status = diagnostic.getStatus();
588                        if (failOnStatuses.length == 0) {
589                                if (status == Status.FAIL) {
590                                        throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
591                                }
592                        } else {
593                                for (Status failStatus: failOnStatuses) {
594                                        if (status == failStatus) {
595                                                throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
596                                        }                                       
597                                }
598                        }
599                        
600                        try {
601                                consumer.splitAndExecute(arg, progressMonitor);
602                                consumer.splitAndCommit(progressMonitor);
603                        } catch (Exception e) {
604                                consumer.splitAndRollback(progressMonitor);
605                                throw e;
606                        }
607                        return diagnostic;
608                } finally {
609                        consumer.close();
610                }
611        }
612        
613        /**
614         * Calls asSupplierFactory(obj, null, null)
615         * @param obj
616         * @return
617         */
618        public static <T> SupplierFactory<T> asSupplierFactory(Object obj) {
619                return asSupplierFactory(obj, null, null);
620        }       
621
622        /**
623         * Wraps object into a supplier factory. Handles adapters, and collections.
624         * @param obj
625         * @return
626         */
627        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
628        public static <T> SupplierFactory<T> asSupplierFactory(Object obj, Class<T> type, FunctionFactory<List<T>, T> joinFactory) {
629                if (obj instanceof Collection && joinFactory != null) {
630                        ListCompoundSupplierFactory<T> ret = new ListCompoundSupplierFactory<>("Supplier collection");
631                        for (Object e: (Collection<?>) obj) {
632                                SupplierFactory<T> esp = type == InputStream.class ? (SupplierFactory<T>) asInputStreamSupplierFactory(e) : asSupplierFactory(e, type, joinFactory);
633                                if (esp != null) {
634                                        ret.add(esp);
635                                }
636                        }
637                        return ret.then(joinFactory);
638                }
639                
640                if (obj instanceof SupplierFactory) {           
641                        return (SupplierFactory<T>) obj;
642                }
643                
644                if (obj instanceof SupplierFactory.Provider && type != null) {
645                        SupplierFactory<T> factory = ((SupplierFactory.Provider) obj).getFactory(type);
646                        if (factory != null) {
647                                return factory;
648                        }
649                }
650                
651                if (obj instanceof Adaptable) {
652                        Adaptable adaptable = (Adaptable) obj;
653                        if (type != null) {
654                                SupplierFactory.Provider provider = adaptable.adaptTo(SupplierFactory.Provider.class);
655                                if (provider != null) {
656                                        SupplierFactory<T> factory = provider.getFactory(type);
657                                        if (factory != null) {
658                                                return factory;
659                                        }
660                                }
661                        }
662                        
663                        SupplierFactory<T> adapter = adaptable.adaptTo(SupplierFactory.class);
664                        if (adapter != null) {
665                                return adapter;
666                        }
667                }
668                
669                if (obj instanceof EObject) {
670                        Adapter adapter = EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter((EObject) obj, SupplierFactory.class);
671                        if (adapter instanceof SupplierFactory) {
672                                return (SupplierFactory<T>) adapter;
673                        }
674                }
675                
676                return null;
677        }
678
679        /**
680         * Wraps object into an {@link InputStream} supplier factory. Handles adapters, and collection and scalar cases.
681         * @param obj
682         * @return
683         */
684        public static SupplierFactory<InputStream> asInputStreamSupplierFactory(Object obj) {
685                SupplierFactory<InputStream> ret = asSupplierFactory(obj, InputStream.class, JOIN_STREAMS_FACTORY);
686                if (ret != null) {                      
687                        return ret.then(OBJECT_TO_STREAM);
688                }
689                
690                // Converting to string, interpolating, streaming
691                SupplierFactory<String> textFactory = context -> new Supplier<String>() {
692        
693                        @Override
694                        public double size() {
695                                return 1;
696                        }
697        
698                        @Override
699                        public String name() {
700                                return "Scalar";
701                        }
702        
703                        @Override
704                        public String execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
705                                return context.interpolateToString(String.valueOf(obj));
706                        }
707                
708                };
709                
710                return textFactory.then(TO_STREAM);
711        }
712
713        /**
714         * Wraps object into an {@link BinaryEntityContainer} consumer factory. Handles adapters and collections.
715         * @param obj
716         * @return
717         */
718        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
719        public static <T> ConsumerFactory<T> asConsumerFactory(Object obj) {
720                if (obj instanceof Collection) {
721                        CollectionCompoundConsumerFactory<T> ret = new CollectionCompoundConsumerFactory<>("Consumer collection");
722                        for (Object e: (Collection<?>) obj) {
723                                ret.add(asConsumerFactory(e));
724                        }
725                        return ret;
726                }
727                
728                if (obj instanceof ConsumerFactory) {           
729                        return (ConsumerFactory<T>) obj;
730                }               
731                
732                if (obj instanceof Adaptable) {
733                        ConsumerFactory<T> adapter = ((Adaptable) obj).adaptTo(ConsumerFactory.class);
734                        if (adapter != null) {
735                                return adapter;
736                        }
737                }
738                
739                if (obj instanceof EObject) {
740                        Adapter adapter = EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter((EObject) obj, ConsumerFactory.class);
741                        if (adapter instanceof ConsumerFactory) {
742                                return (ConsumerFactory<T>) adapter;
743                        }
744                }               
745                
746                throw new NasdanikaException(obj.getClass() + " cannot be wrapped/adapted to a consumer factory");
747        }
748
749        /**
750         * Wraps object into a {@link CommandFactory}. Handles adapters and collections.
751         * @param obj
752         * @return
753         */
754        public static CommandFactory asCommandFactory(Object obj) {
755                if (obj instanceof Collection) {
756                        CompoundCommandFactory ret = new CompoundCommandFactory("Command collection");
757                        for (Object e: (Collection<?>) obj) {
758                                ret.add(asCommandFactory(e));
759                        }
760                        return ret;
761                }
762                
763                if (obj instanceof CommandFactory) {            
764                        return (CommandFactory) obj;
765                }
766                
767                if (obj instanceof Adaptable) {
768                        CommandFactory adapter = ((Adaptable) obj).adaptTo(CommandFactory.class);
769                        if (adapter != null) {
770                                return adapter;
771                        }
772                }
773                if (obj instanceof EObject) {
774                        Adapter adapter = EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter((EObject) obj, CommandFactory.class);
775                        if (adapter instanceof CommandFactory) {
776                                return (CommandFactory) adapter;
777                        }
778                }
779                                
780                throw new NasdanikaException(obj.getClass() + " cannot be wrapped/adapted to a command factory");
781        }
782        
783        /**
784         * Grouping by with support of null keys.
785         * @param <K>
786         * @param <T>
787         * @param elements
788         * @param keyFeature
789         * @return
790         */
791        public static <K, T> Map<K, List<T>> groupBy(Collection<T> elements, java.util.function.Function<? super T, ? extends K> classifier) {
792                Map<K, List<T>> ret = new LinkedHashMap<>();
793                groupBy(elements, classifier, ret);
794                return ret;
795        }       
796        
797        /**
798         * Grouping by with support of null keys.
799         * @param <K>
800         * @param <T>
801         * @param elements
802         * @param keyFeature
803         * @return
804         */
805        public static <K, T> void groupBy(Collection<T> elements, java.util.function.Function<? super T, ? extends K> classifier, Map<K, List<T>> collector) {
806                for (T e: elements) {
807                        K k = classifier.apply(e);
808                        collector.computeIfAbsent(k, key -> new ArrayList<>()).add(e);
809                }
810        }       
811
812        // --- Property computers
813        
814        public static PropertyComputer createEmbeddedImagePropertyComputer(java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) {
815                return new PropertyComputer() {
816                        
817                        @Override
818                        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
819                                return computeEmbeddedImage(context, key, path, type, resolver);
820                        }
821                        
822                };
823        }
824        
825        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
826        public static <U> U computeEmbeddedImage(Context context, String key, String path, Class<U> type, java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) { 
827                if (type == null || type == String.class) { 
828                        int idx = path.indexOf("/"); 
829                        if (idx == -1) { 
830                                return null;
831                        }
832                        StringBuilder imageTag = new StringBuilder("<img src=\"");
833                        imageTag.append(computeEmbeddedImageData(context, key, path, type, resolver));
834                        imageTag.append("\"/>"); 
835                        String imagePath = path.substring(idx + 1).trim(); 
836                        int spaceIdx = imagePath.indexOf(' ');
837                        if (spaceIdx == -1) {
838                                return (U) imageTag.toString();
839                        }
840                        
841                        StringBuilder tableBuilder = new StringBuilder("<table style=\"width:auto\" class=\"table\">").append(System.lineSeparator())
842                                        .append("  <tbody>").append(System.lineSeparator())
843                                        .append("    <tr>").append(System.lineSeparator())
844                                        .append("      <td>").append(imageTag).append("</td>").append(System.lineSeparator())
845                                        .append("    </tr>").append(System.lineSeparator())
846                                        .append("    <tr class=\"bg-light\">").append(System.lineSeparator())
847                                        .append("      <td>").append(imagePath.substring(spaceIdx + 1)).append("</td>").append(System.lineSeparator())
848                                        .append("    </tr>").append(System.lineSeparator())
849                                        .append("  </tbody>").append(System.lineSeparator())
850                                        .append("</table>").append(System.lineSeparator());
851                        return (U) tableBuilder.toString();
852                }
853                return null;
854        }
855        
856        public static PropertyComputer createEmbeddedImageDataPropertyComputer(java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) {
857                return new PropertyComputer() {
858                        
859                        @Override
860                        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
861                                return computeEmbeddedImageData(context, key, path, type, resolver);
862                        }
863                        
864                };
865        }
866                
867        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
868        public static <U> U computeEmbeddedImageData(Context context, String key, String path, Class<U> type, java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) { 
869                if (type == null || type == String.class) { 
870                        int idx = path.indexOf("/"); 
871                        if (idx == -1) { 
872                                return null;
873                        }
874                        try {
875                                StringBuilder imageData = new StringBuilder("data:image/" + path.substring(0, idx) + ";base64,");
876                                String imagePath = path.substring(idx + 1).trim(); 
877                                int spaceIdx = imagePath.indexOf(' ');
878                                URL imageURL = resolver.apply(spaceIdx == -1 ? imagePath : imagePath.substring(0, spaceIdx));
879                                Converter converter = context.get(Converter.class, DefaultConverter.INSTANCE); 
880                                byte[] imageBytes = converter.convert(imageURL.openStream(), byte[].class); 
881                                imageData.append(Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(imageBytes)); 
882                                return (U) imageData.toString();
883                        } catch (Exception e) {
884                                throw new NasdanikaException("Error embedding image data '" + path + "': " + e, e);
885                        }
886                }
887                return null;
888        }
889        
890        public static PropertyComputer createIncludePropertyComputer(java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) {
891                return new PropertyComputer() {
892                        
893                        @Override
894                        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
895                                return computeInclude(context, key, path, type, resolver);
896                        }
897                        
898                };
899        }
900        
901        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
902        public static <U> U computeInclude(Context context, String key, String path, Class<U> type, java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) { 
903                if (type == null || type == String.class) { 
904                        try {
905                                URL includeURL = resolver.apply(path);
906                                Converter converter = context.get(Converter.class, DefaultConverter.INSTANCE);
907                                String includeContent = converter.convert(includeURL.openStream(), String.class); 
908                                return (U) context.interpolateToString(includeContent);
909                        } catch (Exception e) {
910                                throw new NasdanikaException("Error including '" + path +       "': " + e, e);
911                        }
912                }
913                return null;
914        }
915        
916        public static PropertyComputer createIncludeMarkdownPropertyComputer(java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) {
917                return new PropertyComputer() {
918                        
919                        @Override
920                        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
921                                return computeIncludeMarkdown(context, key, path, type, resolver);
922                        }
923                };
924        }
925        
926        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
927        public static <U> U computeIncludeMarkdown(Context context, String key, String path, Class<U> type, java.util.function.Function<String,URL> resolver) { 
928                if (type == null || type == String.class) {
929                        try {
930                                URL includeURL = resolver.apply(path);
931                                Converter converter = context.get(Converter.class, DefaultConverter.INSTANCE);
932                                String markdown = converter.convert(includeURL.openStream(), String.class);
933                                String html = context.get(MarkdownHelper.class, MarkdownHelper.INSTANCE).markdownToHtml(markdown);
934                                return (U) context. interpolateToString(html) ;
935                        } catch (Exception e) {
936                                throw new NasdanikaException("Error including markdown '" + path + "': " + e, e);
937                        }
938                }
939                return null;
940        }

950                return (Class<SupplierFactory<T>>) (Class) SupplierFactory.class;
951        }

970        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })

972                return (Class<FunctionFactory<T,R>>) (Class) FunctionFactory.class;

974
975        /**
976         * Wraps texts so its line width grows proportionally as the number of lines increases. 
977         * @param text
978         * @param initialLineWidth
979         * @param separator
980         * @return
981         */
982        public static String wrap(String text, int initialLineWidth, int widthIncrementPerLine, String separator) {
983                if (Util.isBlank(text) || text.length() < initialLineWidth) { 
984                        return text;
985                }
986                double lines = quadraticRoot(widthIncrementPerLine, initialLineWidth - widthIncrementPerLine, -text.length()); 
987                return WordUtils.wrap(text, initialLineWidth + (int) (widthIncrementPerLine * Math.ceil(lines)), separator, false);
988        }
989        
990        /**
991         * Inserts separators into a list of elements so when these elements are rendered as text the text is wrapped in such a way that
992         * line width grows proportionally as the number of lines increases. 
993         * @param elements Elements to wrap 
994         * @param initialLineWidth
995         * @param separatorSupplier creates separators to insert into the resulting list.
996         * @return
997         */
998        public static <T> List<T> wrap(
999                        List<T> elements, 
1000                        ToIntFunction<T> elementLengthComputer,  
1001                        int initialLineWidth, 
1002                        int widthIncrementPerLine, 
1003                        java.util.function.Supplier<T> wordSeparatorSupplier,                   
1004                        java.util.function.Supplier<T> lineSeparatorSupplier) {
1005                int length = elements.stream().mapToInt(elementLengthComputer).sum();           
1006                int wrapLength = initialLineWidth;
1007                if (length > initialLineWidth) { 
1008                        wrapLength += (int) (widthIncrementPerLine * Math.ceil(quadraticRoot(widthIncrementPerLine, initialLineWidth - widthIncrementPerLine, -length)));
1009                }
1010                List<T> ret = new ArrayList<T>();
1011                int lineLength = 0;
1012                for (T element: elements) {
1013                        if (lineLength > wrapLength) {
1014                                ret.add(lineSeparatorSupplier.get());
1015                                lineLength = 0;
1016                        } 
1017                        if (lineLength > 0) {
1018                                ret.add(wordSeparatorSupplier.get());
1019                        }
1020                        ret.add(element);
1021                        lineLength += elementLengthComputer.applyAsInt(element);
1022                }
1023                return ret;
1024        }       
1025        
1026        private static double quadraticRoot(double a, double b, double c) { 
1027                return (-b + Math.sqrt(b*b - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a);
1028        }
1029        
1030        private static final String PACKAGE_SUMMARY_HTML = "package-summary.html";
1031        
1032        /**
1033         * Java 8 uses package-list, Java 11 uses element-list.
1034         */
1035        private static final String[] PACKAGE_LIST_LOCATIONS = { "package-list", "element-list" };      
1036        
1037        private static final String MODULE_PREFIX = "module:";
1038        
1039        /**
1040         * @param urls Mapping of online URL's (to build links) to offline URL's (to load package lists from).  
1041         * @return Function which given a fully qualified class name returns an anchor linking to Javadoc page for the class. The argument may contain a hash symbol (fragment). 
1042         * Everything after the hash gets transfered to the computed URL providing ability to address fields and methods.
1043         * 
1044         */
1045        public static java.util.function.Function<String, String> createJavadocResolver(Map<URL,URL> urls, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
1046                // package -> Base URL.
1047                Map<String,String> unsortedPackageMap = new HashMap<>();                
1048                progressMonitor.setWorkRemaining(urls.size());
1049                Z: for (Map.Entry<URL, URL> urlEntry: urls.entrySet()) {
1050                        for (String packageListLocation: PACKAGE_LIST_LOCATIONS) {
1051                                try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(new URL(urlEntry.getValue(), packageListLocation).openStream()))) {
1052                                        String module = null;
1053                                        String line;
1054                                        while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
1055                                                if (line.startsWith(MODULE_PREFIX)) {
1056                                                        module = line.substring(MODULE_PREFIX.length()); 
1057                                                } else {
1058                                                        String packageLocation = urlEntry.getKey().toString() + (module == null ? "index.html?" : module + "/");
1059                                                        unsortedPackageMap.put(line.trim(), packageLocation);
1060                                                }
1061                                        }
1062                                        progressMonitor.worked(Status.SUCCESS, 1, "Loaded package list from " + urlEntry.getValue() + " for " + urlEntry.getKey());
1063                                        continue Z;
1064                                } catch (Exception e) {
1065                                        progressMonitor.worked(Status.ERROR, 1, "Could not download package list from " + urlEntry.getValue() + " - " + e);
1066                                }
1067                        }
1068                }
1069                
1070                Map<String,String> sortedPackageMap = new LinkedHashMap<>();
1071                unsortedPackageMap.keySet().stream().sorted((k1,k2) -> k2.length() - k1.length()).forEach(k -> sortedPackageMap.put(k, unsortedPackageMap.get(k)));
1072                
1073                return new java.util.function.Function<String, String>() {
1074                        
1075                        private String getRef(String spec) {
1076                                int hashIdx = spec.indexOf("#");
1077                                if (hashIdx != -1) {
1078                                        spec = spec.substring(0, hashIdx);
1079                                }
1080                                for (Entry<String, String> location: sortedPackageMap.entrySet()) {
1081                                        String key = location.getKey();
1082                                        String value = location.getValue();
1083                                        if (key.equals(spec)) { // Package
1084                                                return value + spec.replace('.', '/') + "/" + PACKAGE_SUMMARY_HTML;
1085                                        }
1086                                        
1087                                        int idx = spec.lastIndexOf('.');
1088                                        if (idx != -1 && spec.substring(0, idx).equals(key)) { // Class
1089                                                return value + spec.replace('.', '/').replace('$', '.') + ".html";                              
1090                                        }
1091                                }
1092                                return null;                            
1093                        }
1094
1095                        @Override
1096                        public String apply(String key) {
1097                                if (key == null) {
1098                                        return key;
1099                                }
1100                                
1101                                int spaceIdx = key.indexOf(' ');
1102                                String spec = spaceIdx == -1 ? key : key.substring(0, spaceIdx);
1103                                String text = spaceIdx == -1 ? null : key.substring(spaceIdx + 1);
1104                                
1105                                String href = getRef(spec);
1106                                if (href == null) {
1107                                        return spec;
1108                                }
1109                                                                
1110                                int hashIdx = spec.indexOf("#");
1111                                if (hashIdx != -1) {
1112                                        String fragment = spec.substring(hashIdx+1);
1113                                        int firstParenthesisIdx = fragment.indexOf("(");
1114                                        if (firstParenthesisIdx > 0 && fragment.endsWith(")")) {
1115                                                // Convert (type[,type]) to -type-type-                                         
1116                                                StringBuilder fragmentBuilder = new StringBuilder(fragment.substring(0, firstParenthesisIdx)).append("-");
1117                                                String[] pTypes = fragment.substring(firstParenthesisIdx+1, fragment.length()-1).split(",");
1118                                                for (String pType: pTypes) {
1119                                                        pType = pType.trim();
1120                                                        int bIdx = pType.indexOf("[]");
1121                                                        if (bIdx == -1) {
1122                                                                fragmentBuilder.append(pType);
1123                                                        } else {
1124                                                                fragmentBuilder.append(pType.substring(0, bIdx));
1125                                                                for (int bc = bIdx; bc < pType.length(); bc+=2) {
1126                                                                        fragmentBuilder.append(":A");
1127                                                                }
1128                                                        }
1129                                                        fragmentBuilder.append("-");
1130                                                }
1131                                                fragment = fragmentBuilder.toString();
1132                                        } 
1133                                        href += "#" + fragment;
1134                                }
1135                                return new StringBuilder("<a href='")
1136                                                .append(href)
1137                                                .append("'>")
1138                                                .append(Util.isBlank(text) ? spec.replace('#', '.').replace('$', '.') : text)
1139                                                .append("</a>").toString();
1140                        }
1141                        
1142                };
1143                
1144        }
1145        
1146        /**
1147         * @param urls List of URL's.  
1148         * @return Function which given a fully qualified class name returns a URL of Javadoc page for the class.
1149         */
1150        public static java.util.function.Function<String, String> createJavadocResolver(Collection<URL> urls, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
1151                Map<URL,URL> urlMap = new HashMap<>();
1152                urls.forEach(url -> urlMap.put(url, url));
1153                return createJavadocResolver(urlMap, progressMonitor);
1154        }
1155        
1156        /**
1157         * Creates a Javadoc resolver for Nasdanika products and their dependencies.
1158         * @param gitDir Git directory with Nasdanika products locally built using Maven so they contain local API docs in their target/apidocs folders to use as offline URL's. If null of if some of apidocs directories do not exist, online URL's are used as offline URL's for those cases.  
1159         * @param progressMonitor
1160         * @return
1161         * @throws IOException 
1162         */
1163        public static java.util.function.Function<String, String> createNasdanikaJavadocResolver(File gitDir, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {
1164                Map<URL,URL> urls = new HashMap<>();
1165
1166                URL java11 = new URL("https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/");
1167                urls.put(java11, java11);
1168                
1169                // Core
1170                addUrl(urls, new URL("https://docs.nasdanika.org/core/apidocs/"), gitDir, "core/target/site/apidocs");
1171                
1172                // HTML
1173                addUrl(urls, new URL("https://docs.nasdanika.org/html/apidocs/"), gitDir, "html/target/site/apidocs");
1174                
1175                // Architecture Framework               
1176                addUrl(urls, new URL("https://docs.nasdanika.org/architecture-framework/apidocs/"), gitDir, "architecture-framework/target/site/apidocs");
1177                
1178                return createJavadocResolver(urls, progressMonitor);
1179        }
1180        
1181        private static void addUrl(Map<URL,URL> urls, URL onlineURL, File gitDir, String offlinePath) throws IOException {
1182                URL offlineURL = onlineURL;
1183                if (gitDir != null && gitDir.isDirectory()) {
1184                        File offlineDir = new File(gitDir, offlinePath);
1185                        if (offlineDir.isDirectory()) {
1186                                offlineURL = offlineDir.getCanonicalFile().toURI().toURL();
1187                        }
1188                }
1189                urls.put(onlineURL, offlineURL);
1190        }
1191        
1192        public static PropertyComputer createJavadocPropertyComputer(java.util.function.Function<String, String> javadocResolver) {
1193                return new PropertyComputer() {
1194                        
1195                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1196                        @Override
1197                        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
1198                                if (type == null || type.isAssignableFrom(String.class)) {
1199                                        return (T) javadocResolver.apply(path);
1200                                }
1201                                return null;
1202                        }
1203                };
1204        }
1205
1206        // --- File utilities ---
1207        
1208        /**
1209         * Walks the directory passing files and their paths to the listener.
1210         * @param source
1211         * @param target
1212         * @param cleanTarget
1213         * @param cleanPredicate
1214         * @param listener
1215         * @throws IOException
1216         */
1217        public static void walk(String path, BiConsumer<File,String> listener, File... files) {
1218                if (files != null) {
1219                        for (File file: files) {
1220                                String filePath = path == null ? file.getName() : path + "/" + file.getName();
1221                                if (file.isDirectory()) {
1222                                        walk(filePath, listener, file.listFiles());
1223                                } else if (file.isFile() && listener != null) {
1224                                        listener.accept(file, filePath);
1225                                }
1226                        }
1227                }
1228        }
1229        
1230        public static void copy(File source, File target, boolean cleanTarget, BiConsumer<File,File> listener) throws IOException {
1231                if (cleanTarget && target.isDirectory()) {
1232                        delete(target.listFiles());
1233                }
1234                if (source.isDirectory()) {
1235                        target.mkdirs();
1236                        for (File sc: source.listFiles()) {
1237                                copy(sc, new File(target, sc.getName()), false, listener);
1238                        }
1239                } else if (source.isFile()) {
1240                        Files.copy(source.toPath(), target.toPath(), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);                      
1241                        if (listener != null) {
1242                                listener.accept(source, target);
1243                        }
1244                }
1245        }
1246        
1247        public static void delete(File... files) {
1248                for (File file: files) {
1249                        if (file.exists()) {
1250                                if (file.isDirectory()) {
1251                                        delete(file.listFiles());
1252                                }
1253                                file.delete();
1254                        }
1255                }
1256        }
1257                
1258        public static void copy(File source, File target, boolean cleanTarget, Predicate<String> cleanPredicate, BiConsumer<File,File> listener) throws IOException {
1259                if (cleanTarget && target.isDirectory()) {
1260                        delete(null, cleanPredicate, target.listFiles());
1261                }
1262                if (source.isDirectory()) {
1263                        target.mkdirs();
1264                        for (File sc: source.listFiles()) {
1265                                copy(sc, new File(target, sc.getName()), false, listener);
1266                        }
1267                } else if (source.isFile()) {
1268                        Files.copy(source.toPath(), target.toPath(), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);                      
1269                        if (listener != null) {
1270                                listener.accept(source, target);
1271                        }
1272                }
1273        }
1274        
1275        public static void delete(String path, Predicate<String> deletePredicate, File... files) {
1276                for (File file: files) {
1277                        String filePath = path == null ? file.getName() : path + "/" + file.getName();
1278                        if (file.exists() && (deletePredicate == null || deletePredicate.test(filePath))) {
1279                                if (file.isDirectory()) {
1280                                        delete(filePath, deletePredicate, file.listFiles());
1281                                }
1282                                file.delete();
1283                        }
1284                }
1285        }       
1286        
1287        
1288        
1289}
